newsitem.title: UK: RMC rise after German rate cut continues.
newsitem.headline: RMC rise after German rate cut continues.

text.p: Shares in building materials concern RMC Group surged in a further reaction to the sharper-than-expected repo rate cut by the German Bundesbank on Thursday, traders said.
By 0902 GMT, the shares were up 40p to 1115p, the highest level since early May.
"RMC does a significant amount of business in Germany, so (the rate cut) is very good news for RMC," one trader said.
Redland Plc continued its rally, rising to the highest level in about 15 months.
The shares were up 10p to 460p after gaining 15p yesterday.
